verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2446>Hacaliah.<s%> Now it <S%H1961>happened<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H3691>Chislev,<s%> [in] the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> while I was in <S%H7800>Susa<s%> the <S%H1002>capitol,<s%>

that <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and some <S%H376>men<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and I <S%H7592>asked<s%> them <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who had <S%H6413>escaped<s%> [and] had <S%H7604>survived<s%> the <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and <S%H5921>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "The <S%H7604>remnant<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H4082>province<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7604>survived<s%> the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> are in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H9567>distress<s%> and <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H6555>broken<s%> <S%H6555>down<s%> and its <S%H8179>gates<s%> are <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>"

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> and <S%H56>mourned<s%> for <S%H3117>days;<s%> and I was <S%H6684>fasting<s%> and <S%H6419>praying<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H577>beseech<s%> Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> for those who <S%H157>love<s%> Him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

let Thine <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive<s%> and Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6419>praying<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee <S%H3117>now,<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> on <S%H5921>behalf<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3034>confessing<s%> the <S%H9128>sins<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Thee; I and my father's <S%H1004>house<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

"We have <S%H2254>acted<s%> <S%H2254>very<s%> <S%H2254>corruptly<s%> against Thee and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H6680>command<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H6680>command<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'If you are <S%H4603>unfaithful<s%> I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%>

but if you <S%H7725>return<s%> to Me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, <S%H518>though<s%> those of you who have been <S%H5080>scattered<s%> were in the <S%H7097>most<s%> <S%H7097>remote<s%> <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from <S%H8033>there<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> to cause My <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell.<s%>'

"And they are Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> and Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou didst <S%H6299>redeem<s%> by Thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by Thy <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H577>"O<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> Thee, may Thine <S%H241>ear<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> and the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> who <S%H2655>delight<s%> to <S%H3372>revere<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H6743>make<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6743>successful<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> and <S%H5414>grant<s%> him <S%H7356>compassion<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>" Now I was the <S%H9307>cupbearer<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
